name: Yvamnyr - The Dark Factory
description:
This is a demo of our first game, Yvamnyr - The Dark Factory.

It's still in early stage of development, but i would like to share this first chapter with the community.

I'am looking forward to update the game further, specially the visual part.

This is the first build that have been released to the public, so every piece of feedback is appreciated.

The game will be released on itch.io and Steam when finished!

Most importantly, i hope you have fun playing it! :)

For any bug report, feel free to leave in the comments or send us an email at: zombiehatsupp@gmail.com
